subject: p17163861
Findings: A left pectoral pacemaker device with leads through the left transvenous approach end into the right atrium and right ventricle respectively. The patient is status post median sternotomy with intact sternal sutures. Heart size, mediastinal and hilar contours are normal. Left lung is remarkable for mild left basal atelectasis. Right lung is clear. No pneumonia or pulmonary edema. There is no pleural abnormality.
